column4: hey guys iv just installede ubuntu inside windows to use as a dual boot its all done and gone through fine but now im in ubuntu its all wierd? its version 11.4 or something and i cant see any of the menus at the top and i have some wierd launcher on th left????
If you prefer the old interface, before you login to the system at the bottom of the screen choose the option  "classic mode" or something like that.
